content.title: Uses
content.description: Wood commercially useful. Fruit pulp is sweet, edible, and can be used for products such as jams and cordials.  Seed is a good source of carbohydrate, fiber, fat, amino acids, and protein. Also, the source of source of sodium, potassium, calcium, magnesium, zinc, and iron. The plant has antioxidant property and used for the treatment of malnutrition. Leaves are used to make baskets.
